None.Name: Shield of the Martyr
None.Description: Activate to create protective shields with a total strength of 400% of the current void power which are applied to friendly units. Shields last for 30 seconds and absorb 50% of all damage. Has a 60 seconds cool-down after the building was built. Reusable every 60 seconds.
